extends Fragment

      protected abstract void bindViews(android.view.View rootView)

      protected abstract void createPresenter()
      This method needs to be implemented by every single class extending BaseFragment and will provide the instantiation of the presenter for this fragment

        protected abstract void createPresenter()

        public void setPresenterArguments()
        Method intended to pass information given through arguments to our fragment to the presenter. Needs to be implemented just by the fragments that need to do it
